articles.title: Introduction
articles.description: Our Shiny Application is built based on the Challenge 3 of [`VAST Challenge 2022`](https://vast-challenge.github.io/2022/).
articles.contents:
This app helps users to explore the following questions regarding the
financial health of the city:
Which businesses appear to be more prosperous? Which appear to be
struggling?
The questions is addressed by analyzing the table turn over rate,
foot traffic and revenue of restaurants and bars. For other businesses,
foot traffic timeline is analysed. Foot Traffic and Revenue are plotted
on timeline in the format of cycle chart.
How do wages compare to the overall cost of living in Engagement?
Are there groups that appear to exhibit similar patterns?
The wage and expenditure pattern of the residents is analysed in this
part.
Which areas have particularly high or low turnover?
Number of available jobs and employee joviality is analysed to
address this questions.
Please refer to Shiny App
for more information.

articles.title: Group 10: Vast Challenge 2022
articles.description:
This study is presented to you by Group 10 under the supervision of Professor Kam.  
This app is build in reponse to the Challenge 3 of [`VAST Challenge 2022`](https://vast-challenge.github.io/2022/), Economic considers the financial health of the city.  
Our Group makes use of R, R Markdown, Shiny to clean the data, curate the graphs and create the user interaction interface.
articles.contents:
Professor Introduction
Prof Kam Tin Seong
Full-time Faculty Associate Professor of Information Systems
(Practice)
